short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Advanced search for X/Google and more

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: X Advanced Search is an extension designed to provide advanced search configurations for x.com/google.com. It is well known that the search capabilities of X/Google are quite powerful, yet there hasn't been an effective way to help users fully leverage these features. This extension unlocks the advanced configuration options of X/Google, offering a more precise and efficient search experience that assists users in finding the information they need.
